code: import React from"react";import{SetCategory}from"../../redux/home/homeSlice";import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from"../../redux/hooks";import"../../styles/style.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var CategoriesField=function CategoriesField(){var CATEGORIES=useAppSelector(function(state){return state.home.categories;});var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var SET_CATEGORY=function SET_CATEGORY(category){dispatch(SetCategory(category));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categories",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"categories__items",children:CATEGORIES.map(function(category){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"categories__items_item",onClick:function onClick(){return SET_CATEGORY(category.name);},children:category.name},category.id);})})});};export default CategoriesField;
